        <blind_copied/>
        <body><html><head><style>
	#snc_notification_preference {
		text-decoration: none;

		text-decoration: none;

</head><body><p><span style="font-size: 12pt;">Hi team,</span></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 12pt;">This is a reminder that there are pending project effort approvals that require your attention. Please review and approve them at your earliest convenience. </span></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 12pt;"></span></p><table style="border-collapse: collapse; width: 100%;" border="1"><thead><tr><th>Number</th><th>Name</th><th>Date</th></tr></thead><tbody><tr><td>PE0001072</td><td><a  Denna</a></td><td>2025-03-17</td></tr><tr><td>PE0001077</td><td><a href="https://dev240427.service-now.com/u_project_effort.do?sys_id=2fc2da32c350221052237405e4013140&amp;sysparm_record_target=u_project_effort&amp;sysparm_record_row=-1&amp;sysparm_record_rows=12&amp;sysparm_record_list=sys_created_on<=javascript:gs.endOfYesterday()^u_approval=requested//">Athul <p><span style="font-size: 12pt;">Zynder Tech</span></p>
